name: part_002
file: tmp_【 告知あり 】沙花叉アニソンフェス開催！2周年もありがとう！#沙花叉アニソンフェス 【沙花叉クロヱ⧸ホロライブ】 [E8HL1I2C_ZQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'SOMEONE ELSE' (Opening theme of the anime 'Working!!') by Sakamata Chloe, Natsuiro Matsuri, and Murasaki Shion. The performance features high-energy choreography and barking ad-libs.

Solo performance of 'The Everlasting Guilty Crown' (Opening theme of 'Guilty Crown') by Sakamata Chloe. The scene features a dramatic atmosphere with red lighting and a large screen displaying her image.

subtitles.original: ワン！ワン！ワン！
subtitles.english: One! One! One!

subtitles.original: まっしぐら　コンコン　チャイムを打たれたなら
subtitles.english: If the chime is struck head-on, ding-dong

subtitles.original: ワン！ワン！ワン！
subtitles.english: One! One! One!

subtitles.original: 打たれちゃったら　産毛フワフワ　ドリームなでられたなら
subtitles.english: If it's struck, and my fluffy downy hair is stroked in a dream

subtitles.original: ワン！ワン！ワン！
subtitles.english: One! One! One!

subtitles.original: 進め切なさ　ほろにの真ん中　射抜かれたなら
subtitles.english: Advance, sorrow, if the bittersweet center is pierced

subtitles.original: ワン！ワン！ワン！
subtitles.english: One! One! One!

subtitles.original: 射抜かれちゃったら　狂おしグビリ　骨が感じてるなら
subtitles.english: If it's pierced, and my bones feel a maddening gulp

subtitles.original: ワン！ワン！ワン！
subtitles.english: One! One! One!

subtitles.original: 汗をかきましょう
subtitles.english: Let's work up a sweat

subtitles.english: One! One! One! One! One! One!

subtitles.original: ワン！ワン！ワン！　ワン！ワン！ワン！
subtitles.english: One! One! One! One! One! One!

subtitles.original: みんな今は好きだ　あなたは明日
subtitles.english: I love everyone right now; you'll be tomorrow

subtitles.original: 素っ頓狂　自然しないでちょうだい
subtitles.english: Please don't act so strangely and naturally

subtitles.original: くじけんのが好きだ　願望が開いた
subtitles.english: I like not losing heart; my desire has opened up

subtitles.original: グッとじっとこらえて　萌えられてみたいよ
subtitles.english: Endure it firmly and still; I want to try being 'moe-fied'

subtitles.original: ワン！ワン！ワン！　ワン！ワン！ワン！
subtitles.english: One! One! One! One! One! One!

subtitles.original: あぁ　宇宙に薔薇の楽園が見える
subtitles.english: Ah, I can see a rose paradise in space

subtitles.original: の甘い隙間の　VIVID SEXY WAR
subtitles.english: In the sweet gaps, a VIVID SEXY WAR

subtitles.original: 窓の向こうに　エデンの園　開いたなら
subtitles.english: If the Garden of Eden opens outside the window

subtitles.original: ワン！ワン！ワン！
subtitles.english: One! One! One!

subtitles.original: 開いたちゃったら　ぼんやり壁に　気ままな模様描いたなら
subtitles.english: If it's opened, and a carefree pattern is drawn on the dim wall

subtitles.original: ワン！ワン！ワン！
subtitles.english: One! One! One!

subtitles.original: 瞳にズンと　異次元くり抜かれたなら
subtitles.english: If another dimension is hollowed out deep in my eyes

subtitles.original: ワン！ワン！ワン！
subtitles.english: One! One! One!

subtitles.original: くり抜かれたら　指げそりと　本音を暴かれたなら
subtitles.english: If it's hollowed out, and my true feelings are exposed with a thin finger

subtitles.original: ワン！ワン！ワン！
subtitles.english: One! One! One!

subtitles.original: 暴かれちゃったら　進め寂しさ　ほろにの真ん中射抜かれたなら
subtitles.english: If it's exposed, advance, loneliness, if the bittersweet center is pierced

subtitles.original: ワン！ワン！ワン！
subtitles.english: One! One! One!

subtitles.original: 射抜かれちゃったら　困った切れ味　爽やか立ち回れたなら
subtitles.english: If it's pierced, if I can move with a sharp and refreshing grace

subtitles.english: One! One! One!

subtitles.english: Let's blow a wink

subtitles.english: Let's blow a wink

subtitles.original: 高鳴り　ドコドコ　ドラムを叩かれたなら
subtitles.english: If the drum is beaten with a thumping heart

subtitles.original: ワン！ワン！ワン！
subtitles.english: One! One! One!

subtitles.original: 叩かれちゃったら　うずきがジクジク　ハート見透かされたなら
subtitles.english: If it's beaten, and the aching heart is seen through

subtitles.original: ワン！ワン！ワン！
subtitles.english: One! One! One!

subtitles.original: 開く油断とりしろ　ベリーベリー　計られたなら
subtitles.english: The opening of carelessness, if very very measured

subtitles.original: ワン！ワン！ワン！
subtitles.english: One! One! One!

subtitles.original: 計られちゃったら　物惜しげにじわじわ　ジク膨らんだなら
subtitles.english: If it's measured, and it swells up bit by bit reluctantly

subtitles.original: ワン！ワン！ワン！
subtitles.english: One! One! One!

subtitles.original: 走り出しましょう
subtitles.english: Let's start running

subtitles.english: Let's blow a wink

subtitles.original: Someone else! Someone else! Someone else! Someone else!
subtitles.english: Someone else! Someone else! Someone else! Someone else!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: The Everlasting Guilty Crown
subtitles.english: The Everlasting Guilty Crown

subtitles.original: あぁ... 世界は終わりを告げようとしている
subtitles.english: Ah... the world is about to meet its end

subtitles.original: 誰にも止められはしない
subtitles.english: No one can stop it

subtitles.original: 始まる崩壊のシンフォニーが鳴り響いて
subtitles.english: The symphony of beginning collapse resounds

subtitles.original: 降る雨はまるで涙の音色
subtitles.english: The falling rain is like the sound of tears

subtitles.original: あぁ　教えて
subtitles.english: Ah, tell me

subtitles.original: 支配し支配され人たちは
subtitles.english: People who rule and are ruled over...

subtitles.original: いつかその心に憎しみを
subtitles.english: ...will they one day have hatred in their hearts...

subtitles.original: そして愛することも...
subtitles.english: ...and even loving...
